name: Remote Control Shuriken - GBCompo21
description:
This game was created for the GBCompo21 Game Jam using ZGB.
Play in the browser or download the rom below.

Coming Soon! I will be posting a video to my YouTube channel for the "making of" of this game. Subscribe if you'd like to see that.

Features
  • 3 unique bosses
  • Custom music created by Scotty Rich
Notes
  • Bosses can be fought in any order. All are unlocked from the start.
  • The eye boss will crash sometimes. I wasn't able to fix it.
FunctionKeyboardConsoleMoveArrow keysD-PadSwitch who is controlledZ / WA ButtonQuit levelBackspaceSelect ButtonStartEnterStart Button

Source code can be found HERE
